## GSVA

Gene Set Variation Analysis (GSVA) evaluates the enrichment of gene sets in each cluster to infer the function of them. [GSVA](https://www.bioconductor.org/packages/release/bioc/html/GSVA.html) package is used to perform GSVA on the Kyoto Encyclopedia of Genes and Genomes (KEGG) pathway gene set. The pathways with an adjusted *P*-value less than 0.05 are shown in the heatmap.
